tests.description: Strict Mode - Use Strict Directive Prologue is 'use  strict'; which contains two space between 'use' and 'strict'
Strict Mode - Use Strict Directive Prologue is ''USE STRICT';' in which all characters are uppercase
Strict Mode - Eval code is strict code with a Use Strict Directive at the beginning of the block
Strict Mode - Eval code is strict eval code with a Use Strict Directive in the middle of the block
Strict Mode - Eval code is strict eval code with a Use Strict Directive at the end of the block
Strict Mode - The call to eval function is contained in a Strict Mode block
Strict Mode - Function code that is part of a FunctionDeclaration is strict function code if FunctionDeclaration is contained in use strict
Strict Mode - Function code that is part of a FunctionExpression is strict function code if FunctionExpression is contained in use strict
Strict Mode - Function code that is part of a Accessor PropertyAssignment is in Strict Mode if Accessor PropertyAssignment is contained in use strict(getter)
Strict Mode - Function code that is part of a Accessor PropertyAssignment is in Strict Mode if Accessor PropertyAssignment is contained in use strict(setter)
Strict Mode - Function code of a FunctionDeclaration contains Use Strict Directive which appears at the start of the block
Strict Mode - Use Strict Directive Prologue is ''use strict'' which lost the last character ';'
Strict Mode - Function code of a FunctionDeclaration contains Use Strict Directive which appears in the middle of the block
Strict Mode - Function code of a FunctionDeclaration contains Use Strict Directive which appears at the end of the block

Strict Mode - Function code of a FunctionExpression contains Use Strict Directive which appears at the end of the block
Strict Mode - Function code of Accessor PropertyAssignment contains Use Strict Directive which appears at the start of the block(getter)
Strict Mode - Function code of Accessor PropertyAssignment contains Use Strict Directive which appears at the start of the block(setter)
Strict Mode - Function code of Accessor PropertyAssignment contains Use Strict Directive which appears in the middle of the block(getter)
Strict Mode - Function code of Accessor PropertyAssignment contains Use Strict Directive which appears at the end of the block(setter)

Strict Mode - Use Strict Directive Prologue is ''use strict';' which appears twice in the code
Strict Mode - Use Strict Directive Prologue is ''Use strict';' in which the first character is uppercase
Strict Mode - TypeError is thrown when changing the value of a Value Property of the Global Object under strict mode (NaN)
Strict Mode - TypeError is thrown when changing the value of a Value Property of the Global Object under strict mode (undefined)
Strict Mode - TypeError is not thrown when changing the value of the Constructor Properties of the Global Object under strict mode (Object)
Strict Mode - TypeError is not thrown when changing the value of the Constructor Properties of the Global Object under strict mode (Number)
Indirect call to eval has context set to global context
Indirect call to eval has context set to global context (nested function)
Indirect call to eval has context set to global context (catch block)
Indirect call to eval has context set to global context (with block)
Indirect call to eval has context set to global context (inside another eval)
Strict Mode - Strict mode eval code cannot instantiate functions in the variable environment of the caller to eval
Direct eval code in strict mode - cannot instantiate variable in the variable environment of the calling context
Calling code in strict mode - eval cannot instantiate variable in the variable environment of the calling context
Strict Mode - eval code cannot instantiate variable in the variable environment of the calling context that invoked the eval if the code of the calling context is strict code
Strict Mode - Strict mode eval code cannot instantiate functions in the variable environment of the caller to eval
Strict Mode - Strict mode eval code cannot instantiate functions in the variable environment of the caller to eval which is contained in strict mode code
this is not coerced to an object in strict mode (Number)
this is not coerced to an object in strict mode (string)
this is not coerced to an object in strict mode (undefined)
this is not coerced to an object in strict mode (boolean)
this is not coerced to an object in strict mode (function)
Strict Mode - checking 'this' (FunctionDeclaration defined within strict mode)
Strict - checking 'this' from a global scope (FunctionDeclaration defined within strict mode)
Strict Mode - checking 'this' (FunctionDeclaration includes strict directive prologue)
Strict - checking 'this' from a global scope (FunctionDeclaration includes strict directive prologue)
Strict Mode - arguments object is immutable
Strict Mode - arguments cannot be assigned to in a strict function
Strict Mode - arguments object is immutable in eval'ed functions
Strict Mode - arguments object index assignment is allowed
Strict Mode - Adding property to the arguments object successful under strict mode
Strict Mode - Deleting property of the arguments object successful under strict mode
arguments[i] remains same after changing actual parameters in strict mode
arguments[i] change with actual parameters
arguments[i] doesn't map to actual parameters in strict mode
arguments[i] map to actual parameter
Arguments Object has index property '0' as its own property, it shoulde be writable, enumerable, configurable and does not invoke the setter defined on Object.prototype[0] (Step 11.b)
Accessing callee property of Arguments object is allowed
arguments.callee has correct attributes
Accessing caller property of Arguments object is allowed
In non-strict mode, arguments object should have its own 'callee' property defined (Step 13.a)

arguments.caller exists in strict mode
arguments.caller is non-configurable in strict mode

arguments.callee is exists in strict mode
arguments.callee is non-configurable in strict mode

Strict Mode - [[Enumerable]] attribute value in 'caller' is false under strict mode

Strict Mode - [[Enumerable]] attribute value in 'callee' is false under strict mode
Strict Mode - TypeError is thrown when accessing the [[Set]] attribute in 'callee' under strict mode

'length property of arguments object exists
